article: "Inner beauty is the real beauty", you might have heard this phrase a thousand times. However, do you know the real _ behind it?  A look of a person is surely important but personal traits are _ important. It is not necessary that a good-looking person would turn out to be an honest one. Looks are not always _ . So, judge a person by his or her traits, which are the real _ of inner beauty. When anyone talks to you, he/she would notice the 42 _ in which you speak. You would be seen as a beautiful person if you speak _ . Nobody will remember what you wore, _ how you looked. So, inner beauty is the first test of true beauty. A person can be beautiful with his or her _ and thoughts. If they are positive, it can be a _ factor for others. It is your ideas that make you beautiful. Many women have complex related to looks, but with good actions, you do not have to feel _ . Outer beauty will _ away, but inner beauty shall remain through your _ . If you have kindness, love, understanding and so on, then you are the most _ person on earth.  "Beauty lies in the eyes of the beholder ." So, never _ outer beauty with inner beauty. Inner beauty has always passed the test of _ . So, the next time you run across a person, do not care about how he/she looks. Inner beauty shall always get ahead of outer beauty. Inner beauty is the real beauty and shall remain.
